title: What can I do after a BA & B.Ed to become a government teacher? - Quora

response.answer_text: After b.ed start applying to government schools. There are many operations under black board projects and sarva Shikha abhiyan one can get contractual job. For permanent job do clear ctet or any state tet then followers by dsssb or apply for kvs.

The State PSC invites application every year and you must apply .There may be test and interview for selection .It will take time.Better apply and join MA .By the time you get appointment you will be PG.You can try college also .
